thread.title: BRIEF-Sl Green Realty Says CEO Marc Holliday's 2017 Total Compensation Was $17.4 Mln Vs $17.3 Mln In 2016

title: BRIEF-Sl Green Realty Says CEO Marc Holliday's 2017 Total Compensation Was $17.4 Mln Vs $17.3 Mln In 2016
text:
Market News April 30, 2018 / 1:00 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Sl Green Realty Says CEO Marc Holliday's 2017 Total Compensation Was $17.4 Mln Vs $17.3 Mln In 2016 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 30 (Reuters) - SL Green Realty Corp:
* SL GREEN REALTY CORP SAYS CEO MARC HOLLIDAYâ€™S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $17.4 MILLION VERSUS $17.3 MILLION IN FY 2016 - SEC FILING
* SL GREEN REALTY CORP SAYS PRESIDENT ANDREW MATHIAS' FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $10.7 MILLION VERSUS $11.2 MILLION IN FY 2016 Source text: ( bit.ly/2raCTqe ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
